definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
proportion of those present and voting
pinyin: chu1 xi2 biao3 jue2 bi3 li4

sentences.english: Moreover, the relatively high proportion of mature or over-mature forests shows that resources in support are insufficient.
sentences.chinese: 近成过熟林所占比例较大，后备资源不足。

sentences.english: Installed with proportional deviation display thermostat, to control temperature accurately.
sentences.chinese: 采用比例式偏差指示温控器，可精确控制温度。

sentences.english: The ratio of commissions to be collected shall be set in accordance with the principle of making an inverse ratio to the auction completion price.
sentences.chinese: 收取佣金的比例按照同拍卖成交价成反比的原则确定。

sentences.english: A dog with the correct proportions and angulation can thereby achieve static balance.
sentences.chinese: 拥有的正确比例和角度，从而达到犬只的静态平衡。

sentences.english: One on offer . In India the poor, proportionately, are more likely to vote.
sentences.chinese: 按比例来说，印度的穷人比中产阶级更乐于参加投票。

sentences.english: This is just some proportionality constant.
Women, for instance, make up only 13% of contributors.
sentences.chinese: 再比方说女性在参与者中，仅占了13%的比例。

sentences.english: National-wide, females claim 38% of the total number of cadres.
sentences.chinese: 全国女干部的比例已占干部总数的38%以上。

sentences.english: It showed that the ratio of alternative pathway in total respiration increased during fruit browned.
sentences.chinese: 果实褐变时，果成交替途径呼吸比例增高。

sentences.english: Allometry is the term used to describe the effect of size on bodily proportions and functions(R. M. Alexander1971).
sentences.chinese: 异速生长是用来描述身体比例和功能的尺寸的术语。

sentences.english: Corrected some of the proportions in Paintshop.
sentences.chinese: 用了电脑软体校正了一些比例。

sentences.english: It was getting out of proportion.
Distribution and ratio of enterococcus species among different animals were different.
sentences.chinese: 不同动物消化道肠球菌种的分布不同，比例各异。

sentences.english: Compared to the pre-MBA survey, the percentage of working in manufacturing industry basically unchanged.
sentences.chinese: 与入学前相比，制造业的比例基本保持不变。

sentences.english: But in the face of homosexuality wooer, female showed remarkably higher percentage of rejection than male.
sentences.chinese: 但对同性恋的求爱，女生拒绝的比例明显高于男生。

sentences.english: The premium rate of disproportional reinsurance by bilateral party agreed.
sentences.chinese: 非比例再保险的保险费率由双方当事人议定。

definition: to take possession of/to occupy/to take up
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
